hero_description: Frontend Developer focused on building fast, clean, and scalable web applications using React and modern JavaScript.
about_me_paragraph_1: I am a Frontend Developer based in Mangaluru, Karnataka, India. I am currently pursuing B.Tech in Electronics & Communication Engineering at NITK, Surathkal (2021â€“2025). I have a strong focus on building responsive web applications and collaborating in agile teams. I enjoy working with [React.js](https://react.dev), [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com), and modern frontend tools.
about_me_paragraph_2: I have experience working as a Full Stack Developer Intern at DataNeuron and as a Freelance Frontend Developer. My passion lies in clean architecture, performance optimization, and creating intuitive user experiences. In my free time, I lead technical clubs like SAE NITK and contribute to open source.
contact_description: Want to build something together? Hit me up on [Email](mailto:rishukumar.work@gmail.com) or [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/rishu-kumar-work). I am quite active there.
